required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clozapine Use Pattern in the Province of Seville
clinical_study.official_title: Clozapine Use Pattern in the Province of Seville

lead_sponsor.agency: Fundación Pública Andaluza para la gestión de la Investigación en Sevilla

clinical_study.source: Fundación Pública Andaluza para la gestión de la Investigación en Sevilla

brief_summary.textblock: CLOZAPINE USE PATTERN IN THE PROVINCE OF SEVILLE

detailed_description.textblock: Subjects with a diagnosis of schizophrenia (F20 of ICD-10) under treatment with clozapine in the province of Seville. The use of clozapine, variability between centers and treatment modification will be identified.

primary_outcome.measure: Identify the pattern of clozapine use in the province of Seville
primary_outcome.description: Identify the pattern of clozapine use in the province of Seville

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyze the variability between centers or professionals
secondary_outcome.description: Analyze the variability between centers or professionals

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyze the changes in the course of the disease since the prescription of clozapine
secondary_outcome.description: Analyze the changes in the course of the disease since the prescription of clozapine

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients who have been prescribed clozapine during 2018
arm_group.description: Patients who have been prescribed (initially or regularly) clozapine during 2018, based on the casuistry provided by the Pharmacy service of the different hospitals.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who have been prescribed (initially or regularly) clozapine during 2018, based on the casuistry provided by the Pharmacy service of the different hospitals.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients who have been prescribed (initially or regularly) clozapine during 2018, based on the casuistry provided by the Pharmacy service of the different hospitals.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Parkinson's disease
- Dementia
